website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for youngsters who love playing in water but are more into interactive play than soaking in a pool.
pros: In addition to small pool area, this unique inflatable play center offers exciting activities for young kids, including ball and ring toss games and slide
Bright, colorful graphics grab children's attention and imagination
cons: Takes a long time to set up, as it has numerous components to inflate
Some reports of air leaks have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes forever to set up, there are a million little separate pieces to blow up and it doesn’t come with a pump. Also having trouble connecting the hose to the sprinkler part, and the inflatable rings both popped immediately. Other than that, it’s very cute and the kids loved it! I had my 11 month old son splashing in there and a few 5 year olds were playing on the slide part and whatnot, so it’s definitely got a nice age-range Added a video that shows most of the pool, I forgot to take one of the second pool behind the slide
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. 2nd summer for it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandson. He loved it. 2nd summer for it. Don't know why people are having to throw away after first year. I just kept box and at end of summer deflated, sprinkled with baby powder, rolled it up and put back in box. Perfect condition for year 2. It is a blow up so yes you have to be careful to a degree but well worth money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This pool developed an air leak in a seam in the slide after two uses. I patched with included patch and another leak developed in the same area after a few more uses. My daughter loved the pool however, (being obsessed with all things Dino), and would have been crushed to lose it. I emailed the company and within minutes received instructions for receiving a replacement. I submitted the required proof for return around 3pm and again received a response in mere minutes assuring me my new pool would arrive soon. Imagine my surprise when my new pool showed up the very next morning! Although there were some issues with the original product the customer service was outstanding. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Richardson

customer_reviews.title: We finally set this up over the weekend and my ...
customer_reviews.text: We finally set this up over the weekend and my 2 year old LOVES it. One thing I have to include on the review is before you get it out, make sure you have an air pump for larger holes. About halfway through, we realized our pump couldn't fit the hole and had to make a trip to wal mart. All of the dinosaurs are not hooked together - they are separate from the pool so lots of airing up - total took about 2 hours since we didn't have the right pump.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  :)
customer_reviews.text: Best kids pool EVER! It is huge, bright and colorful, and has many different fun things to do (slide, ring toss, hoops, and ball trail). The huge blue dino sprinkler can be used with the pool or separately as a fun sprinkler. This kid pool is the BEST I've ever seen, hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: I took 30 or so minutes setting this pool up for my daughter using an electric mattress pump. About 20 minutes into her playing with the pool I noticed that the outer ring of the pool was losing air. I reinflated and left it on my lawn for a few hours after she was done playing with it and now it is almost completely deflated. Considering my 2 year old played with this more gently than I have ever seen her play with anything in her life, I can't understand why it broke so easily. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great fun pool
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids absolutely love it, I see lots if summer fun, perfect for our 4year old and 2 year old. Don’t know about the sturdiness and durability yet just got it, but it seems pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Allie from Tampa

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this pool! It is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this pool! It is a little big for my NY yard but we made it work. It was totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: The product is super cute, perfect size for 2 year olds and up! BUT, like other purchaser mentioned, clearly has a hole(s) somewhere. The pool didn’t even stay inflate for 30 mins. I must have a hole/leak right where the bird sits on a tree in the front of the pool. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Cloud

customer_reviews.title: So cute and fun.
customer_reviews.text: I know it says 2 and older but it was perfect for my 18 month old. The pool is pretty shallow so I think it's best for young toddler age kids. My son had a blast in it today. It comes with so much for a great price. I like that the creature the water comes out of is not attached so you can move it where you'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Janae Soto

customer_reviews.title: Good price point, great product.
customer_reviews.text: This hit us through a very hot summer with a/c that is lacking tremendously. The kids LOVE it and there's so much to do. It's huge! Came packed nicely and used my mouth to blow up some areas and my pump to blow up the main pool. It's lasted all summer on concrete with tarps below it. We are huge fans of this product. It's got a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute splash pad
customer_reviews.text: Super cute splash pad, but it is a huge pain to blow up all of the parts. We have a shop vac that we use to blow up inflatables, but there are at least 13 parts that have to be blown up on this thing. I can’t complain for the price, I am glad to have something my daughter can play in, and with everything sold out online, I’m happy to have this. It got delivered before Fourth of July, so I’m glad to have something fun for our family to do. Ours didn’t come with the volcano. Maybe it is an older or cheaper model?
customer_reviews.author: A.H.H.

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine play pool Disaster..
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to get the float on March 31st, however by April first the slide started to rip on the front right corner and now all the water flows out....we were very disappointed. Poorly maid, I would have spent the extra few bucks to buy an all vinyl kids pool play area. We have 2 kids 2yr and a 3yr...I’m hesitant to buy another one. We bought a bounce house with a vinyl slide at grandmas house and that is strongly recommended to last more THAN 1 DAY of use....
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Byrne

customer_reviews.title: I sent this as a gift to my autistic grandson ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a gift to my autistic grandson who's 4 years old. He loves it! Now, the parents are trying to figure out how to get him out of it :).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t hold air, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The first time we used the play center it wouldn’t hold air. We couldn’t find a hole to patch so it must have been very small. We tried inflating it multiple times but it would only hold air for 5-10 minutes at a time. It would have been too difficult to box up and return so we threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Koppelmann

customer_reviews.title: A Toddler's Dream Pool!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old daughter and all her friends love this pool! It was such a great deal that I couldn't pass it up and I'm so happy I made this purchase. It takes awhile to inflate, but ours has been blown up for a couple weeks and still hasn't needed any extra air. The pool is big... is say 2-3 toddlers could have plenty of room to play in it together all at once. We've even had some older kids play in it. Plus, I can fit too which is amazing since I'm currently pregnant in the middle of summer! I really don't have anything negative to say about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Nice large pool for summer but there are some issues
customer_reviews.text: When I received this pool it was larger than I thought it would be which was great. The first time we blew up the pool my son was having a good time when he brushed up against the main air valve. All the water started to spill out of the sides of the pool because the pool began to deflate. When I checked the valve it was defective and was not sturdy. The slightest bit of pressure or movement caused the valve to open and it was difficult to get it to stay closed. I called Amazon and was provided with a replacement. Overall this is a nice product but it has some issues. The replacement appears to be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST! My 14 months old absolutely loved this! We blew it up with a compressor we have which room about 15 mins but if you didn’t have one it will probably take a while. Such a great deal. True to size & endless fun. I was able to sit in with my son on end & my husband catch him down the slide on the other side. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deebee03

customer_reviews.title: Lots of work to blow up, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: There are at least 9 or 10 different areas that need to be blown up, which was kind of a hassle. My 4-year-old daughter and some of her school friends used it one time, and afterwards the slide stopped staying inflated. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: CML

customer_reviews.title: Needs a high volume low pressure inflator
customer_reviews.text: Get yourself a high volume low pressure inflator like a bed mattress inflator. I used a regular inflator for my bicycle and it took forever to inflate the main pool part. I just bought the Ryobi duel inflator just to inflate this pool. Pros: lots of different activities and things for your kids to play with to keep them entertained. Separate water spraying blue dino that isn’t attached in case you don’t need it. Cons: once the slide is inflated there is no way for your kid to walk between both pools without getting out and walking around or climbing over the slide. Lots of different parts that need to be separately inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Halcyon

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning 😔
customer_reviews.text: Very cool thought sooo wanted to like it my 11 month old daughter had fun in it for like 10 mins but i had it blew up all day and by the afternoon it looked like it deflated some. So ill be returning and here now its listed for like $10 less then i just paid. Picture are when my daughter played in it and then later that day deflating
customer_reviews.author: mommy87

customer_reviews.title: Great pool! My 5 y/o loves it and played ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pool! My 5 y/o loves it and played in it often. Needs to be scrubbed every now and then if you don't drain it after each use. (the bottom will get slimy). And you'll definitely want a air pump because there's a ton of compartments to blow up.
customer_reviews.author: vivi

customer_reviews.title: Takes 15 minutes to inflate and 30 to deflate. And my kids don't love it.
customer_reviews.text: There are so many different compartments to inflate hear that it takes 15 minutes to inflate (with a powerful air compressor) and 30 minutes to deflate with a pump that I use to pull air out. The plastic is pretty thin and twice we have popped holes in the side from it coming into contact with a sharp corner. I cannot see this lasting long but honestly I don't want it too as it is such a pain and my kids don't really like it that much. It is too small to call it a pool. It's a little splash park. I'd only recommend for ages 3 and below.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Countless Fun
customer_reviews.text: What more do I have to say about this product then its utterly amazing. With the kids being home all summer it has served well for the hot days and countless hours of distraction. I have three kids going all the way down two years old and even she can play in here happily. If you have an inflatable pump you'll have no trouble setting this up. The box was a little flimsy and came crushed but everything came pristine. I love keeping my kids entertained and this pool helps with our weekend pool parties.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Fun summer days with a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun for my toddler on these hot summer days! But before we could get the party started we had to make a run to the store for an air pump! So many different compartments to inflate and not enough breathing power from this mama! Other than that I would definitely make this purchase again because of how much my son has been enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Stsierra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long, and no customer support
customer_reviews.text: Was fun while it lasted. Used it perhaps a dozen times. The way the middle section ("slide") is attached to the bottom is very poorly made - the bottom isn't actually one piece. See photo. After inflating it a few times, the glue/seams where the slide top attaches to the bottom just comes apart.... and obviously the pool won't hold water any longer. Contacted customer support - crickets.
customer_reviews.author: Deniz Erkan

customer_reviews.title: Cute Kiddie pool
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need an air pump/compressor to blow up the perimeter of the pool. It took about 10-15 minutes to inflate. All the little parts were easy to blow up. The Loch Ness also took a while to blow up... Half way through I grabbed the air compressor/pump... The pool isn’t deep at all, which is great for small children... it’s about a little bit above ur ankle deep... I am guesstimating to be about 6-10 inch deep... I don’t remember if I checked the product description but I use this without the water so my little one can play with the mini skirball thing, fun slide, and the Dino basketball hoop. I think it’s worth the $40 I paid...
customer_reviews.author: panda14

customer_reviews.title: Check hose connection first.  Fill it on a weekday if you want to complain to support.
customer_reviews.text: Hose connection arrived bent causing much disappointment on the kids. Wish I had opened it before the weekend because Intex support is only available Monday thru Friday. Dull, zero-illustration instructions, no pump, left me at about half way into filling the air in it before I discovered the bent connection. I expected cheap parts sure but not being able to use it out right made this just an angry moment. Good luck trying to put this back in the box for return!
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool in March for the summer for My little one. First there was BLOOD on the pool, which is absolutely disgusting and I would’ve returned it but my return window closed so I am unable too. I then washed it all down and disinfected it. Then Aired it up and in 5 minutes it deflated. I found the hole and patched it but unfortunately it then deflated again so there is another hole somewhere I will have to find. I then blew up the dinosaur sprinkler and guess what? It also deflated and has a hole in it somewhere. Terrible product!!! Don’t buy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh

customer_reviews.title: Cute pool but not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this while it lasted. You’re definitely going to want to keep bigger kids off of it. I recommend having a tarp or something under it rather than directly in the grass. I ended up sending it back bc it got a hole where the slide attached not long after use. It takes time to fill all the different air compartments. I personally prefer the snap set design as long as you have a level surface.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this thing blown up for our 3 year old daughter. It does take some time to blow up (maybe 30 minutes) because each part inflates separately. However, we had no issues with holes or missing parts or anything. Our daughter loves it and all the detail is amazing! I would highly recommend. I cannot attest to durability since we just got it set up today, but she has been jumping around on it and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Aucoin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year had only played in it once before the slide had a hole somewhere and the second time we blew it up it had another hole somewhere along the rim that we couldn’t find to fix either. So we wasted our money, because it can’t be used. So we got 1 1/2 uses out of it. We attempted to patch both, but could find where it was letting air out.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Not enough durability, losing air after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: We've used it once and it already seems to have a leak causing the tree with the Pterodactyl at top that only the trunk is connected to the whole pool is not able to stand up for very long even after I add more air. The small orange dinosaur seems to hold air well. The big long dino seems to lose air too. I've re-inflated it too. My 3 year old, 28lbs, was not rough with the edges or any pieces. We are definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The pool was exactly as described. I was worried because of some of the reviews that I have read that it would go flat in a matter of minutes. It does take a day before stuff starts looking flat which I have found to be normal for blow up pools. We just refill the air and it’s good again for the rest of the day. I would definitely buy again. P.s. I also added a tarp and cardboard under the pool to help it not get popped by rocks or sharp grass.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Febuary

customer_reviews.title: Dino land Play Center
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Dinoland Play Center for my 3 year old grandson so he can have summer fun at Grandma's! It's simply a really fun and great pool! Really cute and can fit several small children at the same time. The quality of the pool is amazing! Very well made. It was very easy to set up. Comes with additional plastic balls and loops so your little one can play games in the pool. You can also hook your water hose to the pool and allow shower like water flow that comes from the middle of the pool. My grandson loved it and so will you!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Avila

customer_reviews.title: I know you want to but, don’t.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT worth the money. Zero informational instructions. After the second use the fountain filled with water and collapsed. I need to somehow return it although it’s still wet and going to be ridiculously hard to fit back in the box. I know these are desperate times and water toys are sold out everywhere but, don’t waste your time or money on this. To add, this is probably the first negative review I’ve written and these really is a poorly designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J

customer_reviews.title: Ripped on the second use and can’t be refunded or replced
customer_reviews.text: I am not please with this product, it seems to be very poorly made. After about 34 days when my young boys (3 and 5) played in it for the second time the inflatable slide tore away from the bottom leaving a giant, unpatchable hole. I contacted the seller to inform them that we used it gently and see what could be done and they said they had a 30 day return policy, no exceptions. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: F & J

customer_reviews.title: fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: kids loved it. Took some time blowing up even though we have an electric pump for rafts to inflate this. No leaks and it survived its first day. So far durability is good and is a good size for young kids. Uses the right amount of water - not too deep for them.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Great for kiddos especially if they love dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this pool, he loves dinosaurs. He would constantly ask to play in it. He would play in it even without water. There is just a few things I would change about it. I would like if you could walk around the slide without getting out of the pool. My son would want to go back and forth but not go on the slide part. He would keep slipping trying to climb in and out constantly. Another thing would be how they air compartments were separated. Some would deflate and would be floppy. Then you can’t fill them up individually.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Looked Great BUT Seam Splits after 1 Use
customer_reviews.text: The slide part of the pool was loved by my granddaughter. BUT Didn't hold up as seem split. Was not overinflated as the system to inflate is old school lung power and doesn't allow for a bike pump to assist the inflation. Lots of effort and money for one days' use. I patched the seem with the enclosed patch and duct tape as well and will test tomorrow. The inflatable features don't hold up well for the ring toss. The separate dinosaurs were a big hit with the kids so not a total failure.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Richter

customer_reviews.title: Deflated constantly until we threw it out!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this pool....it never seemed to hold air since the day we got it. We also bought the mermaid version of this pool to leave at my moms house for our daughter and that one was fantastic. This pool had to be re-blown up a couple of times until finally my husband said to contact the company to return it. Unfortunately it was past the time we could return it so we threw it out. Very upsetting and frustrating to say the least. Don't waste your money on this!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: fun, but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 and 3 year old. They had a blast with it until the bottom ripped where the slide is attached to the bottom of the pool. Everything still inflates, but the water just runs out. some of the inflatable parts around the pool didn't stand up straight no matter how much air you put in it, in our case the ball slide walls and the pterodactyl. The kids still like to play in it... just doesn't hold water anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger kids too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool for my baby boy who is 11 months (size 2t) and 31 pounds... I was hoping this would be big enough for his sister to join who is 6 years (size 8) 56 pounds. She definitely can fit and loves this. Her best friend also got in too she’s 9 years (size 5t) 45 pounds. The 6 year old is in the purple bathing suit and the 9 year old is in the yellow two piece suit. I’ve had the pool for over a month and it’s had no issues. I will say, I’d definitely order a pump next time and save myself an hour of blowing in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air at the seams
customer_reviews.text: The only thing good about this pool is that the kids love it. For me, it's a pain in the a$$. It leaked air at two locations right out of the box. Both leaks were on the seam. I filled it with a bicycle pump and did not overinflate it! For the price of $40 and some change, it wasn't worth returning. I've patched it a few times but so far nothing sticks well to the plastic so I just continue to pump it up when it loses air. Fortunately they are slow leaks.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after inflating the whole pool we noticed the slide started to deflate.😰 I'm so upset, i would return it and just go to a store and buy a pool but since retailer's think because its winter in FLORIDA they don't sell pools.🤦 anyhow my son's 4th birthday party is this saturday and it wouldnt give enough time for us to return and recieve another one. So we are going to have to fix this issue ourselves. But im super disappointed 😒
customer_reviews.author: Jazzieful

customer_reviews.title: Summer bursting bummer after a week
customer_reviews.text: After a small handful of days, there’s already a hole. :( The hole is in the crease of the little slide in the middle, which doesn’t make for an easy repair either. It wasn’t overly inflated either, because I actually left it a little on the soft side to make sure it wasn’t overly inflated. This is our second Intex pool with crease breaking issues. At least the walls are still inflated that the kids have a pool, but they were upset that the slide was broken already.
customer_reviews.author: JohnNJulie

customer_reviews.title: Iffy!!
customer_reviews.text: So this is the cutest! It was perfect for my 4 year old dinosaur loving boy and my 2 year old dinosaur loving girl:) It was easy to inflate! With an air compressor of course! The kids loved it. There are so many different ways to play! 1 HUGE downfall. The slide easily gets a hole in it, and we all know how those little patch repair squares go that come in the box, not to well lol! So of course I bought another and sure enough that one got a hole in the slide! I straight gave up after that. No more slides here!
customer_reviews.author: Qjean

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My twin 3 year olds love this pool! So far it has held up with two 3 years old and 7 year old. The only consare that the air hole for the main part of the pool doesnt like to stay so i constantly have to reinflate it and when the wind blows a little or kids go down the slide, it knocks over the dinosaur that has water coming out for the slide.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: good for a summer
customer_reviews.text: All in all not bad for the price. Good for one season for sure... but even if stored properly not great for a second. We've had this for 10 months at the end of the first summer there was 1 hole in a non essential area. Going to put it up for the second summer and it's a no go. So buy for a summer then toss and repurchase for the next summer. My 1-2yr old loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren Ages 3 and 5 Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This pool was a huge hit with my grandchildren! They love it and it's been the perfect spot for cooling off during our recent 90+ degree weather. Even the adults got in for a quick cool down. It was easy to blow up with an electric air pump, the process went quickly. It's impressive looking when set up in the backyard, even the neighbors came over and wanted to know where we bought it. They couldn't get over how cool it was! Has definitely been worth the cost for hours and hours of summer fun!
customer_reviews.author: A Reader 4455

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. My almost 3 year old loves it. My 11 month old also enjoys it. He can be on his back or stomach and his face is not in the water. I used a hand pump to blow most of this up. The opening for the pool itself is very large and is not suited for the hand pump. I put duct tape over the opening and used the hand pump to blow it up, then took the tape off and blew it up by mouth a little.
customer_reviews.author: Big B

customer_reviews.title: Really big and so colorful
customer_reviews.text: My boys really love this dinosaurs swimming pool, they was so exciting to play in it. Right now, because everyone are stay at home mostly. So I ordered it and tried to get more fun with my kids at yard. It’s really good choices, I was reading others reviews, some said it was lose air after a couple months. Ours is still working well, Hopefully we can keep it longer.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Not durable only lasts a season
customer_reviews.text: We bought this last summer for our daughter. The wall of the ball roller didn’t stay inflated. Otherwise it worked pretty good. Just took it out of the tote for the first use this year and there was a hole in one of the trees and must have another in the bottom. I filled it up and when we came out a couple hours later the walls were deflated and the water mostly out. Really should be able to last more than a season. Especially since my daughter was one last year and didn’t move much around in it. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: chelsy

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot in the sun or shade in AZ
customer_reviews.text: Great product my 3 yr old loves it. Only flaw does NOT do well in AZ. We just moved to AZ and learned fast plastic heats up and shrinks a lot here even in the shade. The poor palm trees and flying dinosaur topple into the pool. Wish there was anchors to help with the wind even just a little. Fun fact: Airmattress pump helps blow it up faster!
customer_reviews.author: Eddy2005

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful worthy investment!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and grandkids had an absolute blast in this! It looks just as cool as all of the pics and videos floating around! My kids take the dinosaur sprinkler and sometimes just use it separately off to the side for a quick cooling off fun backyard good time! The squatting dinosaur became a good time punching bag for the boys, Lol this was great!! We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cute and perfect for summer.
customer_reviews.text: This pool last the whole summer. Was easy to clean and drain. Was perfect for the 2 and 4 year old. Really sturdy and easy to set up. I even laid it myself occasionally and was able fit a grown adult fairly comfortably. Definitely worth the money for a hot summer. Just put it away and was able to pull all the air with a pump and fold it away.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reidy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this inflatable product! It is bigger and larger than I imagined! My son loved it and the sprinklers from the dinosaur makes it even more fun! I really think for the size it’s a great value! Perfect for little ones and they will love the small slide. Even my older kids were trying to play in it. It took a while to inflate but if you have an electric pump it will inflates quickly. Also the dinosaur that sprinkles water is movable so you can change its position!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to inflate!! It included multiple spots that needed to be inflated with several different hole sizes. Even with using an electric inflator, my back was killing me after over an hour of trying to get it up and going. Then after a week I wanted to put it in the garage and water was stuck in many places and would not drain creating a health hazard. I had to CUT the tubes open to release water thus making it impossible to use anymore. I returned after one week.
customer_reviews.author: Juliann K.

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the item came with holes in it because once I was finally able to get it all set up it was going flat within an hour without it even being in use. Secondly, you can’t just plug a little fan in and blow it all up. It is divided into different sections and not all have big enough holes for the blower to fit into. So you can inflate the big part with a machine but basically have to do everything else by mouth. Which takes a very long time. Attempting to return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pich

customer_reviews.title: Very tedious to inflate... very dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as we were really looking for a mini pool/water play set for our 3 year old boy. The first time we started setting this up, we realized this had so many inflatable parts. We still did it any way as our son was eager to play. This is just not something useful to us. To infalte it takes ages as it has so many parts that need to be individually inflated. Very dissapointed in this. Wish there was a way to return this. Sadly, we bought this earlier this year and didnt open it for use until a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Udayan Singh

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My granddaughters love it! So much fun!!!!!! Good quality. My only complaint would be the big dinosaur is not attached so my granddaughter likes to carry it around and gets upset when she can't take it in the house. Easy to clean. Easy to blow up. The waterfall feature they can go through going down the slide is their favorite part. The price was INCREDIBLE! It is as nice as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE NUNGESTER

customer_reviews.title: What a POS!
customer_reviews.text: Um literally got a single use and seam opened up... on the main pool area ring. For the money NO, not okay. I’m really disappointed and summer for the kids is RUINED! How do you tell that to toddlers?!?!
customer_reviews.author: K. Patra

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love love loved this when we first got it. Would still love it but after barely any use and we don't have any pets it is not holding air. Now we can't use it after spending way too much on it because of in season pricing. Highly disappointed that this didn't even last one season and for that price it should have lasted a few.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Valvo

customer_reviews.title: I need a refund. This is ridiculous. Not 1, not 2, but 3 holes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I spent over 4 hours trying to put this darn thing together just for parts of it to start to deflate before my daughter was even able to start swimming in it. Not one, not two, but there different holes in three different parts. Ridiculous. Nothing like spending 45$, 5 days waiting for it arrive, and five hours putting it together for it not even to last the day. I want a full refund. Not to mention I tried to go on the website for a refund and the website is definitely not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so crazy cute. It's a bit of a pain to set up but once it's up it's really cute and the kids love it. We bought this one and another one for our son's first birthday party. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely am happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I'm picky but this is well worth $50. My daughter who is 3 yrs old is 68lbs and she can go down the slide without it messing up. It's sturdy. I love the activities and bright colors. My kids love rolling the ball down the spiral volcano thingy lol. Their dad got in the pool with them also.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Developed a micro leak early on
customer_reviews.text: Developed a micro leak within 2 weeks of use. Inflate in AM, deflated by dinner. I search and search and couldn't find the micro leak. Kids like it, served the Lockdown time well. THe pieces are very light, slight breezes make hte sprinkler hard to use. But the kids loved hte pool.
customer_reviews.author: M.F.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This pool was awesome! Bought it for my LO’s birthday party...there were 7 kids playing in the pool at once...ages 2-5. They LOVED it! It is pretty specious to say the least. It was a great buy. My husband inflated the pool so I have no idea how that process went but I didn’t get any complaints about it so must’ve been alright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great mini pool
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend this product !! My kids loved it !! They had so much fun with it . It has a skid and there’s a little waterfall from the blue Dino . The only thing I do have to say is that it’s a pain in the butt to blow up . Thank god we had one of those machines to inflate balloons or else it really would of took forever
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: AIR LEAKS OUT AFTER ONLY 2 USES
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have believed the other reviews that stated the pool is of poor quality. After only 2 uses (maybe 3 hours tops per use) the slide leaks air and deflates within 20 minutes. We have not been able to find the leak and will probably just throw the entire pool away. The "slide" is the part my grandson loved the most - lesson learned.....
customer_reviews.author: DavidS

customer_reviews.title: So cute and fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This pool has provided endless hours of entertainment this summer! I would definitely buy this again if was well worth it. We purchased the pump that amazon recommended and I’m so glad we did. I couldn’t have blown this up without it. About 30 mins of pumping and it was all set up. It’s been blown up since we got it a few months ago and it’s never had to be reinflated. The slide did get a little hole in it after a while but it comes with a patch so it was easily fixed and is good as new! We plan to put this in our basement over winter and fill it with ballpit balls!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blowup pool for the entire family!
customer_reviews.text: This blowup pool is great! Got it for my sons 3rd bday party (in the beginning of June) and we kept it up practically all summer!! The kids love going down the slide through the sprinkler! Even us adults used it! The slide is just the right angle for an adult to use as a back rest and lean against...and then to have that long dinosaur sprinkling water over you!!! SO PERFECT for those 100+ degree afternoons!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Kanagaki

customer_reviews.title: Good for various age ranges
customer_reviews.text: Found this beauty for a great price. So glad I got this my kids love it and it got here just in time for the summer. It’s easy to put up quick and easy to clean up and take down. Don’t regret my decision at all. Best price for something that kids from 4 months to 6 maybe even 8 years old can play on and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our quarantine fun during this shelter in place! You definitely couldn’t blow it up with your breath alone, luckily we had a pump from an air mattress. It also had a small tear where the slide is connected to the pool bottom but was easily patched with some gorilla glue. My 3yr old loves dinosaurs so it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one use
customer_reviews.text: This pool is a great size for my 1.5 and 4 year old. The slide and the sprinkler arch are super fun details and they loved it. Unfortunately the slide got a whole in one of the seams the first day of use (very normal, not heavy or aggressive use). My husband patched the seam and we used it the next day. On day 2, a second leak developed on the same seam. I have attempted to contact Intex with no success. This was a gift from the Easter Bunny a couple of months ago, so we have passed the return window and are now stuck with this really cute, but not so fun pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very low durability
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to inflate with air pump. Durability is problem. At second time inflate, I found air leak at with very small hole. There are some product include patch kit for small hole but this product doesn't include. Dont think it will last till next season.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisLee

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun! Takes time to set up, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this pool! It did take about 20-30 mins to set up but our air pump was a little slow. If you had to blow this all up by mouth, it might take all day! 😂 Anyway, great investment overall. No complaints. It came with a patch and it stayed aired up nicely. Lots of interaction for the kiddos and it looks awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Goldeeloxxx

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought! Easily worth the month!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pool for little kids. Much bigger than I thought- it is kind of like two pools in one. Plus you get several inflatable parts that are separate (like the cool big dino). The sprinkler part is completely removable. My kid loves running underneath it in the yard away from the pool. It was kind of a pain to blow up- you'll need a big mattress air pump or air compressor. I didn't have a correct size air nozzle, but it worked anyway. I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Aut

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it (ages 2yr and 9yr). My oldest seems a bit big so he doesn't go on the slide part, but day 2 there was already a hole on one of the seems of the slide. Patch fixed it, so far so good. The dino that sprinkles the water is a bit to light. A simple gust of wind and it has toppled over. Over all I guess it is a nice little set up. No complaints from the kids anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Such a good deal for the size of the pool
customer_reviews.text: Such a good deal for the size of the pool. My one year old is a little too young for it she would rather play with her water table but I still have it out if she wants to play in it. It is a good product. We move it around the yard after letting the water out so it doesn’t kill the grass and it has held up well
customer_reviews.author: kfaul

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have a pump
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have a pump. So you have to do it all by mouth. You have to blow up the arch dinosaur, the dinosaur holding the hoop,2 parts on the ball roll, 2 parts on the slide, the palm trees and the palm tree with the dinosaur blows up with the main part of the pool and it falls. I took a blow dryer to the nozzle of main part To get it to blow up faster. The big dinosaur on top droops when the water it turned on no matter how much air is in it.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa L Oliphant

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandkids love this pool. It is great for toddlers & young kid. Hours of fun! You can regulate the flow of water that comes out above the slide. We used a cheap electric pump off amazon & got it all inflated in 45 min. There are several inflation valves for all the different pieces. I used that same pump to deflate it & put it away. It seems to be well made & withstands rough boys
customer_reviews.author: BoatingGirl

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on 4/20 for my 1 year old granddaughter, this is the second time using it and this is what happened to the plug!! Please know that after the first use it was deflated and put away I blew it up today (the second use) go to put plug in and it pulled away from the pool. I contacted intex and they are requiring me to pack up and mail back, what a joke!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waster your money
customer_reviews.text: Im sending this back within 10 minutes of it being up i spent 20 just trying to blow the thing up. With two very anxious toddlers it was frustrating. Part of the slide the giant dinosaur and the blue lining of the actual pool all had holes in them. It stayed up long enough for my kids to play in it for maybe 20 minutes before the water started to come out. The giant dinosaur won't stay up it kept falling over. For this to have so many reviews and mostly good I was completely surprised. Incredibly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: whitney r.

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love their pool! What a life saver this summer! It’s colorful, big and interactive. It looks great in our backyard as it’s a super cute Dino theme! Perfect for my 2 and 4 year old boys.
customer_reviews.author: Modern Latina Motherhood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: It does take a while to fill up all the parts with air. I did not blow up the additional dinosaur since it’s not really needed for my 18 month old now. The dinosaur that sprinkles the water is detached so the wind would make it fall which I fixed that issue by just putting the water house on top of it’s legs to hold it down. It’s been up for over 24 hours and no air has leaked!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for my wide age range of kiddos (6mo - 13years). I enjoy cooling my feet and getting “spritzed” from the side. We have enjoyed the water features and various accessories. My kids just love the water and option for a different outdoor activity. We have had a little trouble keeping the trees and the cute pterodactyl inflated enough to stay upright; we have only used our mouth to inflate these parts, but still seems like these cute decorations are full - yet they droop from the top. Overall I love it and it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mombat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!! I know its pretty expensive and I sat on it for a while but my girl (just turbed 3) loves dinosaurs & shes been asking for this for a while. It kept her busy for HOURS. The slide and sprinkler were huge hits and i like the small cusion under the slide. Theres really a lot to do with the ball ramp ring toss and basket ball trex.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Most definitely get an air pump. Mine was missing one of the toy attachments we didn't realize till the end of the day but I would still buy again my girls love it we didn't need the missing piece fun was had we enjoyed it very much . Holds a good amount of water and its a good size
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Love this pool
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an amazing price. It does take a special pump to blow up and it takes awhile to fill all the areas with air. Totally worth it as this offers hours of fun and has so many play options including a ball area a dinosaur hoop and a blow up slide. The sprinkler is a fun touch. Good
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for several kids, but takes a long time to blow up and fill up with water
customer_reviews.text: We used this at our kids' birthday part. A lot of toddlers were excited about using this. We've had it for 2 years and it's still going strong. It's huge and does take up a long of space. Cleaning can be a pain (as with most inflatable pools), but it's so fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: HDN

customer_reviews.title: Kiddie pool on steroids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this blow up pool! It's awesome, sturdy and has lots of features on it so they never get bored. Slide, overhead sprinkler, ball hoop and ball ramp, rings, etc. One thing to note is that it's got about 6-8 different parts you have to inflate separately, so it's easiest if you have one of the little electrical pumps. This would be near impossible to blow up without it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase. Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was waaaaaaay bigger than I expected! It’s awesome! All the little extra features it has are great too. I thought I was getting a little pool for my one year old but it’s definitely something for a little bit older. He can still wade and splash. So excited that this thing should last us a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Fun and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Were very happy with this purchase. The pool is colorful and large. It offers a lot and our gang loves it. The durability is questionable which is why I selected four stars. I'd be amazed if this made it through two seasons, but for the time it's performing well and, for the price, it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: KnowYourWhy

customer_reviews.title: Defective product. Water stuck in the inflatable sections
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this for my son. We have used it three times and he loves it. Unfortunately, I realized today that something is defective on it. The sprinkler part keeps water in and the only way to get the water out is through the air he to blow it up..it won't go out the he for the hose. Also, a ton of water some how got into the main inflatable section. Between these two I spent an hour trying to get all of the water out. We have deflated it when we're not using it. My son loves it but I wish we could have gotten more use out of it :(
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephews birthdays. (4 and 2) It was such a hit! The four-year-old absolutely loved it and all the other kids at the party wanted to play in it also. The only downside is the dinosaur that the water sprays out of kept falling over from the wind. Even though that happened it was still by far the best gift!
customer_reviews.author: kayla flenar

customer_reviews.title: this has proved to be a great purchase. With a 2-year old
customer_reviews.text: A month in, this has proved to be a great purchase. With a 2-year old, the water depth is perfect and this has held up really well as have most of the products we've purchased from Intex. We'll see how many years we get out of this, but the last kiddie pool was a shark -shaped thing and lasted 4 years until I left it outside and the wind blew it into rose bushes. I dont expect to make that mistake and this should be great until the kids are plenty old enough to move on.
customer_reviews.author: GLo

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend! Very good price!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is adorable!!! Love it!! Haven’t been able to try outside yet since it’s chilly but I don’t doubt it will be a total hit!! I Inflated it to make sure there were no holes and so far it seems fine. My daughter had a blast playing with it in our living room
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Takes awhile to air up, but it's fun.
customer_reviews.text: The kids are having a blast with this pool. It takes forever to inflate because you have to inflate each part separately, even with an electric pump it took a long time. It seems to hold air well, we have only had to add air a couple of times. It is sturdy, and the kids like the sprinkler as well. It's nice that it is not attached, we can move it wherever we want. All in all, it's been fun.
customer_reviews.author: Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old son who is obsessed with dinosaurs loves this! We’ve had it about 2 hours and he hasn’t gotten out of it. There are 15 or so different part to blow up. It doesn’t come with a pump so make sure you have one. We have Coleman quick pump from Target, worked perfectly. I can’t give feedback on durability. I’ll update if anything happens. Recommend so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: Intex Dinoland Inflatable Play Center, 119in X 90in X 44in, for Ages 2+
product_meta.description:
Transform your backyard into your kids' Very own mini water park with Jurassic fun!

this activity play center is perfect for kids ages 2+ years. It has a dinosaur or prehistoric theme with 4 games in just one play center which your kids will surely enjoy. It has a slide landing mat extra padding to make sure your kids are safe from harmful falls. It has a convenient drain plug in the pool floor for easy clean up. The package also includes a repair patch.Games: volcanic ball roller - play center includes 6 colorful plastic 3 1/8" Fun ballz
ring toss - makes use of Dino hoops included in the packaged> ball toss - kid's focus is improved with this game using Dino hoops and fun ballz
water slide - soft slide and splash wading pool near a movable built-in Dino arch water spray that can be attached to a garden hose
additional product Details: approximate inflated size - 131 in L x 90 in W x 44 in H (3.3 m x 2.3 m x 1.1 m)
water capacity - 74 gallons (280 L), 6 in of wall height, using maximum water depth marked on pool wall
maximum weight capacity - 178 lbs
important: only set up on level ground.Scroll up Now and click the "add to cart" Button!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Transform your backyard into your very own mini waterpark with the Intex Dinoland Play Center. Children will have hours of refreshing fun with this four-games-in-one prehistoric-play center! Slide and splash into the wading pool or have Jurassic fun with Dino Hoops and Volcanic Ball Roller games (with six colorful Fun Ball included). Keep cool with the movable Dino Arch water spray which attaches to a water hose. An included soft slide with a landing pad will be a delight to everyone. A drain plug in the pool floor is provided for convenience. Age grade: 3+ years. Approximate inflated size: 131in L x 90in W x 44in H (3.3m x 2.3m x 1.1m). Water Capacity: 74 gallons (6in of wall height). Maximum Weight Capacity: 178 lbs. Includes: Built-in water sprayer. Dino Hoops and Volcanic Ball Roller games. Six colorful plastic balls. Water slide and soft landing mat. Drain plug. Repair patch.
feature_bullets: Keep cool with the movable Dino Arch water spray which attaches to a water hose
An included soft slide with a landing pad will be a delight to everyone
Water Capacity: 74 gallons (6in of wall height)
Approximate inflated size: 131in L x 90in W x 44in H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,140 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
